pages.text: Entities become lighter than air, like silver tufts of dandelion, and are blown away from you.$(br2)With modifiers, you can instead pull entities towards you, blow away all entities in a circle, or increase the size of the blast.$(br2)Modifiers can even turn it into a handy, fire-extinguishing tool!

pages.title: Spell Configuration
pages.text: $(bold)Cooldown:$() The spell has a cooldown of $(spell:dandelion_winds/SECONDS/cooldown) seconds.$(br2)$(bold)Range:$() Entities within your range of vision up to $(spell:dandelion_winds/range_1) blocks away are blown back. With the $(modifier:strong_gusts)$() modifier, this distance increases to up to $(spell:dandelion_winds/range_2) blocks away.$(br2)$(bold)Strength:$() Entities are knocked upwards with a strength of $(spell:dandelion_winds/distance). With the $(modifier:strong_gusts)$() modifier, this distance is increased by a

further $(spell:dandelion_winds/additional_distance).$(br2)$(bold)Fall Damage:$() With the $(modifier:grounded_wind)$() modifier, the fall distance is artifically inflated by $(spell:dandelion_winds/PERCENT/additional_fall).$(br2)$(bold)Slow Fall:$() With the $(modifier:slow_falling)$() modifier, entities are granted Slow Fall I for $(spell:dandelion_winds/SECONDS/slow_duration) seconds.$(br2)$(bold)Poison:$() With the $(modifier:poisonous_breeze)$() modifier enabled, entities are given Poison $(spell:dandelion_winds/ROMAN/poison_amplifier) for $(spell:dandelion_winds/SECONDS/poison_duration) seconds.

$(bold)Fire:$() With the $(modifier:flaming_wind)$() modifier, entities are set ablaze for $(spell:dandelion_winds/fire_duration) seconds.$(br2)$(bold)Items:$() With the $(modifier:item_updraft)$() modifier, item entities are also affected.$(br2)$(bold)Suction:$() With the $(modifier:suction)$() modifier, entities are pulled towards you instead.$(br2)$(bold)Extinguish:$() With the $(modifier:extinguisher)$() modifier, fires in the area of the blast are extinguished.

$(bold)Circle:$() With the $(modifier:circle_of_winds)$() modifier, all entities around you are affected instead of the regular blast radius.$(br2)$(bold)Peaceful:$() With the $(modifier:peaceful_winds)$() modifier, non-hostile entities are unaffected by this spell.
